overview: These four documentaries last almost six hours and provide a vivid account of Wagner's Der Ring des Nibelungen illustrated bu numerous music examples. Directed by the award-winning director Eric Schulz (ECHO Klassik, Gramphone Award, Romy), the film demonstrates that "Wagner's Ring in really very simple ... This is educational television in the very best sense of the term" (Kurier, Vienna).
title: The World of the Ring
